full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 161 of 262 1872 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 MR. EVERDELL: May I inquire, your Honor? 2 THE COURT: You may, Mr. Everdell. 3 CROSS-EXAMINATION 4 BY MR. EVERDELL: 5 Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Rodgers. 6 A. Good afternoon. 7 Q. Mr. Rodgers, you testified that you started working as a pilot for Jeffrey Epstein about 1991; is that right? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. And when you were hired, you then hired your friend who I think you'd been working with, Larry Visoski? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. Okay. So you started together roughly? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. And when you started in '91, you were the chief pilot and Larry Visoski was the co-captain? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. And you continued -- sorry, that changed, I think, in about, what was it, 2004-ish? 16 A. 2004, end of 2004. 17 Q. Okay. And at that point, Larry Visoski became the chief pilot and you became the co-captain, is that right? 18 A. Correct. 19 Q. And you continued to work for Mr. Epstein as his co-captain until 2019? 20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019023

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 161 of 262 1872 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross

MR. EVERDELL: May I inquire, your Honor? THE COURT: You may, Mr. Everdell. CROSS-EXAMINATION BY MR. EVERDELL: Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Rodgers. A. Good afternoon. Q. Mr. Rodgers, you testified that you started working as a pilot for Jeffrey Epstein about 1991; is that right? A. Yes. Q. And when you were hired, you then hired your friend who I think you'd been working with, Larry Visoski? A. Yes. Q. Okay. So you started together roughly? A. Yes. Q. And when you started in '91, you were the chief pilot and Larry Visoski was the co-captain? A. Yes. Q. And you continued -- sorry, that changed, I think, in about, what was it, 2004-ish? A. 2004, end of 2004. Q. Okay. And at that point, Larry Visoski became the chief pilot and you became the co-captain, is that right? A. Correct. Q. And you continued to work for Mr. Epstein as his co-captain until 2019?

additional_notes: The document is a court transcript with clear and legible text. There are no visible redactions or damage.
